arts.ttl: Manchester United XI vs Nottingham Forest – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Manchester United travel to the City Ground today, aiming for a fourth consecutive Premier League victory. This would represent their best winning streak of the season so far. After a difficult start, Rúben Amorim’s side have certainly found form. In fact, since the third matchday, only Arsenal have picked up more points than United. arts.ttl: Nottingham Forest vs Manchester United – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Manchester United will travel to the City Ground on Saturday, aiming to win their fourth consecutive Premier League match. They face a Nottingham Forest side, however, who are still searching for a first league win under new manager Sean Dyche. arts.ttl: Nottingham Forest bidding to equal 115-year streak in Manchester United Premier League showdown
arts.sum: Nottingham Forest can equal a 115-year streak when they play host to Manchester United in the Premier League on Saturday afternoon.

arts.ttl: Amorim delivers Martinez verdict as Man United prepare for Forest showdown
arts.sum: Manchester United head coach Ruben Amorim reveals that Lisandro Martinez will not be involved in Saturday's Premier League clash with Nottingham Forest.

arts.ttl: Sean Dyche confirms Chris Wood will miss Manchester United clash
arts.sum: Nottingham Forest boss Sean Dyche has confirmed that striker Chris Wood will miss Saturday's game against Manchester United. As well as Wood, Dyche confirmed that several Forest players will play no role in Saturday's game, pointing out the club's growing injury woes.
